s1.message: Fixed: "Not loaded" in the status bar on startup and context menu resetting to default (dropping compatibily with Mozilla Suite before 1.7 and Firefox before 0.9 for that reason)

s2.message: Added an icon to the toolbar (Firefox only, can be moved/removed via standard "Customize" dialog)

s3.message: Added an option to hide "Adblock" in the status bar

s4.message: Added an option to block ads in local pages (for compatibility with Sage)

s5.message: Made whitelist filters apply to both whole pages and individual items

s6.message: Made "Disable on site" add more specific filters

s7.message: Preferences dialog: Parts of the "Options" menu moved into the new "Filters" menu and the context menu

s8.message: Preferences dialog: Made "Options" menu apply changes immediately and not when "OK" was pressed

s9.message: Preferences dialog: Made menu items to disable whenever necessary

s10.message: Added "Adblock Link" to the context menu (if "Check banner links" is enabled)
